title: Powering the Future: Germany’s Wasserstoffstrategie in the Transition to Climate Neutrality – Case Study on Green Hydrogen for the Chemical Industry
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Valentin Benedikt Seithuemmer, Julia Valentina Lutz, Samuel Jaro Kaufmann Jaro Kaufmann, Haripriya Chinnaraj, Paul Rößner, Kai Peter Birke
This article provides a comprehensive insight into Germany’s transition to climate neutrality, bringing together the political framework of Germany’s Climate Protection Act (CPA), the funding strategy of its key pillar,...
